title: Pavel Mezlík
text:
Pavel Mezlík (born 25 June 1983) is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Mezlík started his football career in <a href="Rud%C3%ADkov">Rudíkov</a>. In 1998, he moved to <a href="FC%20Zbrojovka%20Brno">FC Zbrojovka Brno</a>. On 22 May 1999, at the age of 15, he appeared in a league match against <a href="FC%20Karvin%C3%A1">FC Karviná</a>, becoming the youngest player in the history of <a href="Gambrinus%20liga">Gambrinus liga</a>. He played in Brno until 2008, with the exceptions of loans at <a href="FC%20Hradec%20Kr%C3%A1lov%C3%A9">FC Hradec Králové</a> and <a href="Vyso%C4%8Dina%20Jihlava">Vysočina Jihlava</a> in 2006 and 2007. In 2008 Mezlík moved to <a href="SK%20Dynamo%20%C4%8Cesk%C3%A9%20Bud%C4%9Bjovice">SK Dynamo České Budějovice</a> where he plays to date.
Mezlík played for Czech youth national teams since the under-15 level.
